comment: The class had 4 tests and 10 discussion posts with an optional paper. Do the work and use the textbook, and you will pass.
Easy class. 3 short papers, weekly discussions, and 2 exams. Lenient grader. Would take again.
Gibson is the best. Super lenient on due dates and is so so nice.

Professor Gibson is a very knowledgeable and helpful. He does sometimes take a few days to respond to an email but other than that he is great! The course is straightforward and he is lenient with due dates.

This is a simple online class. 14 discussions, 3 papers, midterm, and final. If you email him he will likely respond in 24-48 hours. Most of the discussions have you analyze movie/TV clips by applying theories and concepts learned in the text. Papers take a while to write, but are interesting. Only downside is workload is a little high some weeks.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: This class is an easy A and Prof Gibson is the best. He is an easy grader, but make sure you get your work done. Discussions every week, 3 papers total, a midterm, and final exam.

If you are looking for a professor that is an easy grader and doesnt require attendance (asynchronous class) take Professor Gibson. If you are looking for a professor that will reply to your emails, dont take him. Ill leave it at that.

Discussion are very fun and help apply what we learn in class to real events or movie scenes to get a better understanding. The reading are very detailed and long for such a small book compared to the lecture slides being so short. If you take notes reading youll be fine. Any questions you have just email him, it takes 1-2 days to hear back.

Professor Gibson seems like a great guy, but he didn't teach this class. Heard from him less than a dozen times all semester. One sentence or less of feedback on any assignments. The content and structure of the course are pretty good, but it's hard to learn when the professor is AWOL 98% of the time.

mid term & final, weekly DP. overall pretty easy going but dont expect him to round your grade. kinda passive aggressive, rare extra credit, probably wouldnt take him again unless I absolutely had to. funny content with his course requirements so thats a plus

Barely any communication from this guy. the first two months of the semester he did not reach out and barely did after that, all the assignments did not have updated due dates, no study guides for the exams. the content was good and interesting but there was no interest or care from the professor. take someone else

He was a great teacher. This is the first online class that I've actually looked forward to the discussion boards - he used videos and links that made them relevant and entertaining. Midterm and final are multiple choice, and the papers were fun. I feel like I'll be able to use this content in real life. I would absolutely take him again!
